
describe-apps
*************


DESCRIPTION
===========

Requests a description of a specified set of apps.


SYNOPSIS
========

   aws opsworks describe-apps
     [--stack-id <value>]
     [--app-ids <value>]


REQUIRED PARAMETERS
===================

None


OPTIONAL PARAMETERS
===================

"--stack-id"  (string)
   The app stack ID.

"--app-ids"  (list of string)
   An array of app IDs for the apps to be described.

   *Parameter Syntax*

      ["string", ...]
